altTitles.en: Scissor Seven: Black and White Twin Dragons

description.en: Mo Lang, a bad boy, and Bai Qi, his genius friend, lived a quiet life in a village in the distant country of Niuzhan. Until one day, a mysterious assassin from the country of Xuanwu appears, who completely subverts their lives, forcing the two youngsters to embark on an adventure that will change the world. The manhua is a prequel to the animated series Scissor Seven, chronicling events from before the original series.

altTitles.th: จอมเวทไร้ขีดจำกัด

altTitles.ja: 無限の魔法使い

description.en:
After Sirone was abandoned in a stable, he was found by a family of hunters and raised in a loving home. 

Despite the hardships of the peasant life, he learned how to read from a young age and became obsessed with books, especially ones on the history of magic. One day, he has an unlikely encounter with a mage and learns how to enter the "spirit zone," the first step to learning how to use magic. 

Although they say only nobles can be mages, will Sirone be able to prove his infinite potential?

title.en: My Dearest Self With Malice Aforethought

altTitles.ru: Мое дорогое Я со злым умыслом

altTitles.ja-ro: Shinai naru Boku e Satsui o Komete

altTitles.ja: 親愛なる僕へ殺意をこめて

description.de:
Auf den ersten Blick scheint Eiji ein ganz normaler Student zu sein, doch er hat ein Geheimnis: sein verstorbener Vater war ein berüchtigter Serienmörder, der für seine extreme Grausamkeit bekannt war.
Eines Tages wacht Eiji neben einem schönen fremden Mädchen auf, das anscheinend in ihn verliebt ist und behauptet, seine Freundin zu sein, doch eigenartigerweise kann er sich nicht an sie erinnern. Die letzten Tage scheinen wie aus seinem Gedächtnis gelöscht, und es fühlt sich an, als hätte jemand anders die Kontrolle übernommen. Zur selben Zeit findet die örtliche Polizei eine aufs Übelste verstümmelte Leiche, und für sie besteht kein Zweifel: Eijis Vater ist zurück... doch kann das wirklich sein?
description.en: Urashima Eiji, a college student, goes to sleep after a fun drinking night with his friends. When he wakes up he discovers a beautiful girl next to him who treats him as if they are in a loving relationship. Later, Eiji finds out that 4 days have passed since he went out with his crew. What did he do during all that time and why does he have no memory of it? By confronting that reality, he will be caught in tragedy…
description.ne: एइजी, कलेज उमेरको कुमारले कुनै दिन प्रेमिका हुने सपना देख्छ... अनि एक दिन आफ्नो "प्रेमिका" को साथ आफ्नो ओछ्यानमा उठ्छ! त्यति मात्र होइन, उसको साथीले उसलाई बताउँछ कि ऊ झगडामा परेको छ ... र त्यो तीन दिन बितिसक्यो जुन एइजीलाई याद छैन? के अँध्यारो रहस्यहरू लुकाइरहेका छ ... एइजी आफैले?
description.ru:
Урашима Эйджи, студент колледжа, засыпает после веселой ночи с друзьями. Когда он просыпается, он обнаруживает рядом с собой красивую девушку, которая ведет себя с ним, как со своим парнем. Позже Эйджи узнает, что с того вечера прошло 3 дня. Что он делал все это время и почему не помнит ничего об этом? Столкнувшись с реальностью, он попадет в трагедию…  
  
Itou Shouta's Twitter: [@shota\_itooooo](https://twitter.com/shota_itooooo)
description.vi: Urashima Eiji, một sinh viên đại học, đi ngủ sau một đêm uống rượu vui vẻ với bạn bè. Khi tỉnh dậy, anh phát hiện ra một cô gái xinh đẹp bên cạnh, người đối xử với anh như thể họ đang trong một mối quan hệ yêu đương. Sau đó, anh phát hiện ra rằng 4 ngày đã trôi qua kể từ khi anh đi ra ngoài cùng với đám bạn của mình. Anh ấy đã làm gì trong suốt thời gian đó và tại sao anh ấy không có ký ức về nó?. Khi đối mặt với thực tế đó, anh sẽ bị cuốn vào bi kịch...

altTitles.ja: ぼくの村の話

description.en: A story based on real-life events in 1966. The Sanrizuka Struggle told from the perspective of the peasants fighting for their land.

altTitles.en: I'll be Taking Over this Duchy
I'll Take the Dukedom From Today

altTitles.es-la: Tomaré el Ducado a Partir de Hoy

description.en:
"I was a noble this whole time?!"

Hilde, a commoner who works at a restaurant in the village, is suddenly notified by a handsome man named Logan that she is a family member of one of the empire's four duchies and hears that her mother 'Lucia Arpeggio' was a powerful mage in the past.

Duke Arpeggio offers to make her an official member of the family if she can prove that she has strong magical powers, and Hilde accepts in order to escape from her oppressed commoner livelihood and enjoy a comfortable life.

However, her excitement doesn't last long… Culture, magic, history, literature, etc. The number of things nobles needed to learn were endless! In addition, forget about welcoming Hilde, her family members only sent her cold looks and even put her life in danger…

"You've left me with no choice. I, a former commoner, will be taking over this duchy!"
description.pt-br:
"Eu era uma nobre esse tempo todo?!"

Hilde, uma plebeia que trabalha em um restaurante na vila, é repentinamente notificada por um homem bonito chamado Logan de que ela é membro da família de um dos quatro ducados do império e ouve que sua mãe 'Lucia Arpeggio' era uma poderosa maga no passado.

O Duque Arpeggio ofereceu torná-la um membro oficial da família se ela puder provar que tem fortes poderes mágicos, e Hilde aceita para escapar de seu sustento oprimido e desfrutar de uma vida confortável.

No entanto, sua empolgação não dura muito... Cultura, magia, história, literatura, etc. O número de coisas que os nobres precisavam aprender era infinito! Além disso, esqueça a recepção de Hilde, seus familiares apenas lhe lançaram olhares frios e até colocaram sua vida em perigo…

"Vocês não me deram escolha. Eu, uma ex-plebeia, assumirei este ducado!"

description.en:
The Imperial Knight Judith was once a scumbag who would do anything for money. She lived as a slave to money as a dog of the imperial family and a tool of her commander. Under the guise of destitution, she abandoned her guilt. But what was at the end was betrayal and death.

However, when she opened her eyes, she went back to being a new knight after six years?

'I'm not going to be a swordsman for money anymore!'

In front of Judith, who is determined to live a different life than before, the commander of the Red Knights and scouts appears...

"I assure you that you will be treated fairly. Why don't you join the Red Knights?"

Judith decided not to pursue money blindly as a Red Knight, abandoning her past of being a Black Knight. Can she live this life without regret?

---
After dying at the hands of her backstabbing superior, money-grubbing Judith learned the hard way that bounty is never worth bloodshed. When she somehow finds herself alive and well, six years prior to her death, she decides to use her second chance at life to abandon her greed and become a genuine knight. She begins by accepting Captain Kaillou Lewalmeigh's offer to join the honorable Order of Red Knights. Will Judith be able to redeem herself by overcoming the wrongdoings of her past?

---

description.fr:
Judith est un chevalier imperial qui a vécue en tant que chien et outil de la famille impériale, son désir d'argent était si fort qu'elle ne voyait aucune ligne de limite à ses actes, cependant lorsque son chef n'a plus eu besoin d'elle, il l'a trahit et assassiné. 

Judith revient alors mystérieusement des années en arrière, là où elle a encore le choix de changer de destin, plus jamais elle utilisera son épée contre de l'argent. Elle est décidée à vivre une autre vie.

Et une opportunité se présente à elle quand le commandant des chevaliers rouges apparaît.

---
Le chevalier impérial Judith était autrefois une ordure prête à tout pour de l'argent. Elle vivait comme une esclave de l'argent, comme un chien de la famille impériale et un outil du chef. Sous couvert de dénuement, elle a abandonné sa culpabilité. Mais à la fin, elle n'a connu que la trahison et la mort. Cependant, quand elle a ouvert les yeux, elle est redevenue un nouveau chevalier après six ans?

«Je ne serai plus un épéiste pour de l'argent!»

Devant Judith, qui est déterminée à vivre une vie différente de celle d'avant, apparaît le commandant des chevaliers rouges et des éclaireurs….

«Je vous assure que vous serez traitée équitablement. Pourquoi ne rejoignez-vous pas les Chevaliers rouges?»

Judith a décidé de ne pas poursuivre aveuglément l'argent en tant que chevalier rouge, abandonnant son passé de chevalier noir. Peut-elle vivre cette vie sans regret?

---

description.id:
Pengkhianatan berujung kematian menyadarkan Judith bahwa dia harus mengubah jalan hidupnya. Berawal dari seorang Kesatria Hitam yang terlampau setia pada sang Komandan, Judith pun beralih menjadi Kesatria Merah yang tak lagi diperbudak oleh uang. Bukan hal yang mudah memang, sebab bayang-bayang akan pertumpahan darah dan nyawa yang pernah ia permainkan terus menerus menghantuinya. Namun perkataan sang Guru di masa lalu tak ayal menjadi pedoman Judith di saat goyah. "Jika kau menginginkan jabatan, tanah, dan emas, kau bukanlah seorang kesatria, melainkan ahli pedang semata.

---

description.ko:
황실 기사 유디트는 한때 돈만 쥐여 주면 뭐든 했던 쓰레기였다.
황실의 개로, 단장의 도구로, 돈의 노예로 살았다.
가난을 핑계 삼아 죄책감을 버렸다.
그러나 끝에 있던 건 배신과 죽음이었다.

하지만 눈 떠보니 6년의 세월을 회귀해 신입 기사 때로 돌아와 있는데...?

'이제 돈 때문에 움직이는 칼잡이는 되지 않겠어.'

이전과는 다른 생을 살겠다며 다짐하는 유디트 앞에
적기사단장이 나타나 스카우트하는데......

"합당한 대우를 약속하겠다. 적기사단에 소속을 두지 않겠나?"

흑기사였던 과거를 버리고 적기사로서
눈먼 돈을 좇지 않기로 한 유디트.
이번 생은 후회하지 않는 삶을 살 수 있을까?

---

description.th:
หลังจากเสียชีวิตด้วยน้ำมือของผู้บังคับบัญชาที่แทงข้างหลัง จูดิธผู้กระหายเงินได้เรียนรู้วิธีการที่เงินรางวัลจะไม่คุ้มกับการนองเลือด เมื่อเธอพบว่าตัวเองยังมีชีวิตอยู่และสบายดี เมื่อหกปีก่อนที่เธอจะตาย เธอตัดสินใจที่จะใช้โอกาสครั้งที่สองในชีวิตเพื่อละทิ้งความโลภและกลายเป็นอัศวินที่แท้จริง เธอเริ่มต้นด้วยการยอมรับข้อเสนอของกัปตัน Kailou Lewalmeigh เพื่อเข้าร่วม Order of Red Knights จูดิธจะสามารถกอบกู้ตัวเองด้วยการเอาชนะความผิดในอดีตของเธอได้หรือไม่?

description.tr:
İmparatorluk şövalyesi Judith bir zamanlar para için her şeyi yapan pisliğin tekiydi. Para kazanarak yoksulluktan kurtulmak için imparatorluk ailesinin ve komutanın kölesi gibi hayatını yaşadı. Ama sonunda ihanet ve ölümle karşılaştı. Ancak altı yıl sonrasında gözlerini açtığında yeni bir şövalye olarak hayata geri mi dönmüştü? "Artık para için kılıç ustası olmayacağım!" diyen Judith'in önüne, eskisinden farklı bir hayat yaşatmaya kararlı olan Kızıl Şövalyeler ve İzciler Komutanı çıkar... "Sana adil davranılacağından emin olabilirsin. Neden Kızıl Şövalyelere katılmıyorsun?" derler ve Judith, Kara Şövalye olma geçmişini terk ederek Kızıl Şövalye olarak körü körüne para peşinde koşmamaya karar verir. Peki bu hayatı pişmanlık duymadan yaşayabilir mi?

---

description.vi:
Judith đã từng là một kẻ cặn bã có thể làm bất cứ điều gì vì tiền. Cô đã trở thành nô lệ của đồng tiền, trở thành một công cụ, một con chó trung thành của đế quốc. Thế nhưng đến cuối cùng thứ cô nhận được lại là sự phản bội và cái chết. Nhưng mà khi tỉnh lại thì cô đã trở về 6 năm trước, trở về những năm tháng cô mới trở thành kỵ sĩ...? Judith đã tự thề rằng sẽ không sống như trước đây nữa sẽ không trở thành một kiếm khách vì tiền mà bất chấp tất cả nữa. Thủ lĩnh của Red Knight (Tổ chức kỵ sĩ áo đỏ) đã xuất hiện và nói với Judith: “Ta sẽ đối xử thích đáng với ngươi. Ngươi sẽ gia nhập Red Knight chứ?” Liệu rằng Judith có thể từ bỏ quá khứ vào trở thành một kỵ sĩ áo đỏ hành hiệp không chạy theo đồng tiền? Liệu rằng lần này Judith có thể sống một cuộc sống mới không khiến mình hối hận?

---

description.zh:
皇室的骑士尤迪特作为金钱的奴隶，只要有报酬就接受一切任务，但最后等待她的是背叛和死亡。然而她一睁眼发现自己重生回了6年前，那时她还是个新人骑士…她决心不再被金钱所左右，过全新的生活，想要抛弃黑骑士的过去，成为红骑士的她，这一生究竟能否做出毫不后悔的决定呢？

description.pt-br:
A Cavaleira Imperial Judith já foi uma canalha que faria qualquer coisa por dinheiro.
Ela vivia como uma escrava do dinheiro como uma cadela da família imperial e uma ferramenta do chefe.
Sob o pretexto de miséria, ela abandonou sua culpa.
Mas o que estava no fim era traição e morte.
No entanto, quando ela abriu os olhos, ela voltou a ser um novo cavaleiro depois de seis anos?
-Não vou mais ser espadachim por dinheiro!
Na frente de Judith, que está determinada a viver uma vida diferente da anterior, o comandante dos Cavaleiros Vermelhos e batedores aparece...
“Garanto que você será tratado com justiça. Por que você não se junta aos Cavaleiros Vermelhos?”
Judith decidiu não perseguir dinheiro cegamente como Cavaleiro Vermelho, abandonando seu passado de Cavaleiro Negro.
Ela pode viver esta vida sem arrependimento?

---

description.en:
A necromancer is a profession considered the noble of nobles, with less than 1,000 in the population worldwide! I was born with a diamond spoon, no, a necromancer spoon in my mouth! 

... Or so I thought. 

"I’m just a defective necromancer." 
*Using skill, [Summon Ordinary Skeleton (E-Rank)].*

You'd think a necromancer should be able to summon liches, Dullahans, or death knights. But nope, I can only summon skeletons. But then one day, suddenly… 

[Hidden condition achieved!]
[Condition: The 10,000 Uses Rule]
[Your rank has upgraded to D-rank!] 

I achieved the hidden condition and gained the ability to raise my skeletons. From E-rank to S-rank! 

The story of Joo Donghoon unfolds, the world's only cursed necromancer, who’s speeding toward becoming a ranker!

altTitles.ja: サーシャちゃんとクラスメイトオタクくん
Саша и ее одноклассник Отаку

altTitles.es-la: La chica de secundaria Sasha-chan y su compañero de clases Otaku-kun

altTitles.vi: Bé sơ trung Sasha và thằng bạn Otaku cùng lớp

description.en:
I am an aspiring mangaka, currently assisting in the production of erotic doujinshi as a middle school student. While I was reading doujinshi at school, a beautiful girl very interested in erotic things, Sasha-san, suddenly called me “Master”!?

The story of a beautiful, cheerful girl volunteering to be my ecchi disciple.
___
**Alt Official Raw:** [niconico Manga](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/57098)
description.fr:
Fujiwara est un mangaka amateur, il dessine des mangas érotiques alors qu’il n’est que collégien. Tandis qu'il lisait un porno à l'école, une jolie fille nommée Sasha qui s’avère être très intéressée par ces choses, et lui adresse la parole, elle se met même à l’appeler "Maître" !? 

  C’est l'histoire d'une belle et joyeuse fille qui se porte volontaire pour être mon disciple dans la perversion.
description.ja: 僕は未来の大漫画家にして現えっちな同人誌アシの中学生。学校で同人誌を読んでいたら、えっち方面に興味津々の美少女、サーシャさんから「ししょー」と呼ばれ‥‥!?
description.es-la: Sin importarle el qué dirán y sin temor a caer en lo más bajo de la escala social dentro de la escuela, Otaku-kun no oculta su gran afición por los mangas para adultos, cosa que le hace ganarse el rechazo de su salón apenas en el primer día de clases; sin embargo, Sasha, lejos de sentir aberración por su afición, muestra un interés peculiar, iniciando así una relación... ¡¿mentor-alumna?!

title.en: Kirawaremono no Tenisha wa, Demodotta Isekai de Dekiaisareru

altTitles.ja: 嫌われ者の転移者は、出戻った異世界で溺愛される

description.en:
Thirteen-year-old Towa, suffering from a severe case of "Chuunibyou" syndrome, is suddenly transported to another world. Although he is a rare foreigner in the new land, he has yet to manifest his "gift"—a unique ability granted only to otherworlders. To hide his lack of powers, he puts on an arrogant front, which ended up pushing away even the person he secretly admired, his own guard knight, Griz. One day, he was attacked from behind. "I’ve been killed!" he thought—only to wake up back in his original world.

Fifteen years passed, and he lived a mundane life as an ordinary office worker, haunted by memories of Griz. Then, he suddenly found himself lost in that other world once again! Determined to live a quiet life this time, but for some reason, Griz, whom he's reunited with, keeps closing the distance between them...?

Lee Joon was an ordinary high school student.

During the entrance ceremony, he was caught up in a strange phenomenon and died.

[You have died.] [Restarting from checkpoint.] [Loading…]

But then, a message appeared before his eyes.

『Congratulations on your acceptance at Nakseong Highschool, the school of secrets and mysteries. Uncover the shady secrets hidden within the school, or fight against the legends and ghost stories of the campus in order to earn points to unlock special abilities. Additionally, you must gather comrades to prevent the resurrection of the Demon King before graduation. The world is in your hands.』

altTitles.ja: アオのハコ

description.en:
Taiki Inomata is on the boys' badminton team at sports powerhouse Eimei Junior and Senior High. He's in love with basketball player Chinatsu Kano, the older girl he trains alongside every morning in the gym. One Spring day, their relationship takes a sharp turn ... And thus begins this brand-new series of love, sports and youth!

---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media (2023)
description.fr:
Taiki Inomata, membre du club de badminton, a eu le coup de foudre pour Chinatsu Kano, la star du club de basket de son établissement. Il s'entraîne à ses côtés tous les matins. Sa relation avec Chinatsu va prendre un tournant totalement inédit lorsqu'un jour de printemps, une nouvelle des plus déconcertantes va lui offrir une opportunité inespérée de conquérir sa belle.

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Delcourt/Tonkam**
description.ja: バドミントン部に所属する猪股大喜（いのまたたいき）は、女子バスケ部の先輩・鹿野千夏（かのちなつ）に恋をしていた――。自主練を真摯に取り組む姿に心惹かれていたが、思いもよらぬ事実が発覚し…!?　道のりは遠く、想いは近く。
description.kk: Тайки Иномата - спортқа терең бағытталған Еймей орта және жоғары мектебінің бадминтон тобында ойнайды. Ол әр таң сайын мектеп спортзалында онымен бірге жаттығатын Чинацу Кано атты үздік баскетболшы сенпайға ғашық. Бір күні олардың қарым - қатынасы өзгеріске ұшырап, арасындағы қашықтық жойыла бастады... Осылай, көктемнің бір кезінде мектеп спорт залында тағы да бір махаббат, спорт және жастық шақ оқиғасы басталды.
description.tl: Si Taiki Inomata ay nasa boys' badminton team na sports powerhouse ng Eimei Junior at Senior High. In love siya sa basketball player na si Chinatsu Kano, ang babaeng mas matanda sa kaniya na kasama niya magpraktis kada umaga sa gym. Isang araw, ang kanilang relasyon ay biglang nagbago.
description.uk:
Тайкі Іномата — учасник команди з бадмінтону, який вчиться у школі Еймей. Щодня він намагається прийти до школи якомога раніше, але його завжди випереджає Чінацу Кано, в яку він закоханий.

Чінацу — зірка команди з баскетболу. Хоч Тайкі добре грає в бадмінтон, він далеко не настільки популярний, як Чінацу, що робить шанси на взаємну симпатію низькими. Але за дивним поворотом долі Чінацу починає жити в його будинку.
description.vi:
Taiki Inomata, năm ba sơ trung, là thành viên của đội cầu lông. Kể từ khi tập luyện cùng với đội cầu lông, cậu luôn cố đến sớm nhất có thể, thế nhưng, cậu chỉ là người thứ hai đến nhà đa năng. Bởi vì người đầu tiên luôn đến sớm nhất, chính là Chinatsu Kano, năm nhất cao trung, và là người mà cậu thích.

Vì sự chênh lệch giữa mức độ nổi tiếng mà cậu cảm thấy mình không thể kéo gần khoảng cách với cô ấy. Thế nhưng...

Vào một ngày đẹp trời, vì chuyện gia đình, Chinatsu Kano đã đến sống chung với Taiki Inomata.

Với cơ hội ngàn năm có một này, với cái flag romcom to hơn núi Phú Sĩ này, liệu rằng cậu chàng Taiki có thể làm nên chuyện hay không?
description.es-la: Taiki Inomata forma parte del equipo masculino de bádminton en el prestigioso instituto deportivo Eimei Junior y Senior High. Su corazón late por Chinatsu Kano, la hábil jugadora de baloncesto con la que comparte entrenamientos matutinos en el gimnasio. En un día primaveral, su relación da un giro sorprendente… Y así se inicia esta nueva serie que combina amor, deportes y la efervescencia de la juventud.
description.pt-br: Taiki Inomata está na equipe de Badminton dos meninos na Powerhouse Esportiva Eimei Junior e Senior High. Ele está apaixonado por jogador de basquete Chinatsu Kano, a menina mais velha que ele treina ao lado de todas as manhãs no ginásio. Um dia de primavera, seu relacionamento tem uma virada acentuada ... e assim começa esta nova série de amor, esportes e jovens!

altTitles.ja: ギルティサークル

description.en: April! Sawaya Doji's college life at his dream school of Seio University starts with an encounter with the beautiful Kaede Hoshimi during the club recruiting fair. Sawaya believes that if he goes to Tokyo... if he joins a university... if he joins a club, he can get a girlfriend! It's a great way to meet new people, but what kind of club has he gotten himself into?
description.ja: ４月！憧れの青応大学へと入学した大学１年生・沢屋童二は、サークル勧誘期に美少女・星見楓と出会う。「東京に行けば…大学に入れば…サークルに入れば、彼女ができる！」と信じる沢屋は星見楓とともに派手目なサークルの新歓コンパへと参加するが……。沢屋が足を踏み入れたサークルの罪深き実態、秘密とは何か！？
description.pt-br: Abril! A vida universitária de Sawaya Doji em sua escola de sonho da Universidade de Seio começa com um encontro com a bela Kaede Hoshimi durante a feira de recrutamento do clube. Sawaya acredita que se ele for para Tóquio... se ele entrar em uma universidade... se ele entrar em um clube, ele pode conseguir uma namorada! É uma ótima maneira de conhecer novas pessoas, mas em que tipo de clube ele se meteu?

altTitles.ja: おでかけ子ザメ

altTitles.en: Child Shark Going on an Outing

description.en:
The adventures of a baby shark in nostalgia-filled Yauo Town. 

Cider on a summer day, freeze pops, radio calisthenics, festival stalls, and hanging out with friends. The world sparkles when reflected in the eyes of the baby shark.

A little retro, a little wistful, and the warmest short comic!

altTitles.ja: ダンジョンリセット

description.de:
Dawoons normales Leben wird auf den Kopf gestellt, als er in den Dungeon gerufen wird, wo er ein tödliches Spiel gegen gefährliche Monster und lebensbedrohliche Fallen spielen muss. Was die Sache schlimmer macht, ist, er ist nur ein einfacher Handwerker mit null Kampffähigkeiten. Aber nachdem Dawoon in eine Falle gerät und einen fehlerhaften Reset überlebt, hat er willkürliche und dennoch sehr hilfreiche Fähigkeiten. Zusammen mit einem blutrünstigen Gefährten und einem niedlichen Eichhörnchen muss er sich etwas einfallen lassen, um das Spiel zu gewinnen und nach Hause zurückzukehren. Welche Abenteuer erwarten ihn in den Tunneln – jetzt, wo die Regeln für ihn scheinbar nicht mehr gültig sind?

---
- [Official German Translation](https://www.tappytoon.com/de/comics/dungeon-reset-de)
description.en: Dawoon's ordinary life is turned upside down when he is summoned into the Dungeon, where he must play a deadly game, outlasting dangerous monsters and life-threatening traps. To make matters worse, he's only a mere crafter with zero combat abilities. But after Dawoon falls into a trap and survives after a glitched reset, he's gained random but oddly helpful skills. He'll need to get creative to clear the game and return home, with a bloodthirsty assistant and an adorable ground squirrel along for the ride. Now that the rules no longer apply to him, what possibilities await in the tunnels below.
description.fa: ⁧⁧   وقتی که بازنشانی شروع بشه، همه چیز به حالت قبلش برای شرکت کننده های بعدی برمیگرده، چرا بازنشانی روی من کار نمیکنه؟! با یک مهارت ساده بازی برای جئونگ داوون درون دانجن شروع میشه .
description.fr:
La vie ordinaire de Dawoon bascule le jour où il se retrouve invoqué dans un monde parallère, dans lequel il va devoir jouer à un jeu mortel intitulé Dungeon Game. Il se retrouve ainsi obligé à faire face à de dangereuses créatures, ainsi qu'à de nombreux pièges mettant constamment sa vie en péril. Et comme si cette situation ne suffisait pas, il s'avère également que l'abilité dont il a été doté est totalement inutile en combat. Néanmoins, après être tombé dans un piège et avoir mystérieusement survécu, un étrange bug va lui donner de nouvelles compétences aléatoires, mais étrangement utiles. Il va devoir redoubler d'astuce pour finir le jeu et pouvoir enfin rentrer chez lui, tout en ayant à ses côtés un Assistant de jeu assoiffé de sang, et un adorable petit écureuil. Maintenant qu'il n'a plus aucune règle à suivre avec assiduité, que va-t-il se passer pour lui dans cet étrange univers ?

---
- [Official French Translation](https://www.tappytoon.com/fr/comics/dungeon-reset-fr)
description.ja:
｢このダンジョンはリセットされます｣ 一度プレイしたダンジョンや罠は次の｢ユーザー｣のためにリセットされる。 しかしその｢リセット｣が俺には適応されない！？ 絶えずリセットされるダンジョンで唯一自由の身となった「奏多」。 その場しのぎで武装した｢バグ｣人間 定岡奏多のダンジョン開拓期が始まるーー！

---
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/40532)
description.ko:
[던전이 리셋됩니다.]

한번 플레이한 던전이나 함정은 다음 '유저'들을 위해 '리셋'이라는 과정을 거친다.
그 '리셋'이, '나'에게는 적용되지 않는다?!


끊임없이 리셋되는 던전에서 유일하게 자유로워진 존재.
압도적인 노가다로 무장한 '버그 종자' 정다운의 던전 개척기가 시작된다!

---
- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%8D%98%EC%A0%84-%EB%A6%AC%EC%85%8B/2373)
description.ru: [Идет перезагрузка Подземелья.] Подземелье или ловушки, в которых была игра, проходят стадию перезагрузки для следующих пользователей.Может, эта «перезагрузка» применима и ко мне?! Единственное существо, которое свободно от постоянно перезапускаемой Пещеры. Вооружившись грандиозной силой, Чон Да Ун начинает освоение Подземелья!
description.th:
[ดันเจี้ยนกำลังรีเซ็ต]  
เมื่อมีการเดินสำรวจดันเจี้ยนเกิดขึ้น, กับดักทุกอย่างเริ่มทำงาน, มันก็จะเริ่มทำการรีเซ็ตตัวเองเพื่อสำหรับ "ผู้เล่น" คนต่อไป  
แต่ทว่าการรีเซ็ตเหล่านั้นดันใช้ไม่ได้กับฉัน! ฉันจะต้องอยู่อย่างไร้จุดหมายในดันเจี้ยนแห่งนี้อย่างไร้กำหนด, ฉัน, จัง ดาอุน  
"เจ้าข้อผิดพลาด" ได้ได้เวลาเริ่มออกสำรวจดันเจี้ยนแห่งนี้แล้ว!
description.zh-hk:
［副本即將重置。］

為提供下一批「玩家」體驗，
已通過的副本、已觸發的陷阱
都會經過名為重置的過程。
然而，那所謂的「重置」居然對「我」不管用?!

在不斷重置的副本裡，身為唯一的自由之身，
只能把苦力活做好做滿，「農起來」武裝自己，
「Bug仔」鄭多運的副本開墾記就此展開!

---
- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E5%89%AF%E6%9C%AC%E9%87%8D%E7%BD%AE/140)

altTitles.ru: Приди же в Мир Демонов, Ирума-кун!

altTitles.th: อิรุมะคุงกับโรงเรียนปิศาจ

altTitles.ja: 魔入りました！入間くん

altTitles.id: Selamat datang di sekolah iblis! Iruma-kun

description.en: Hopeless pushover Iruma Suzuki has found himself in a devil of a predicament… His trashy parents have sold off his soul, and he now has to live and attend school in the Netherworld. But with his unique survival skills and doting demon grandfather’s support, Iruma will surely make it through this hellish experience. He’ll just need to subjugate rival classmates, summon familiars, and more, all while never revealing that he’s human… Easy as *aleph, bet, gimel*, right?
description.es:
Con una vida bastante desgraciada y unos padres vagos y avaros, Iruma es arrastrado al infierno contra su voluntad después de que estos lo vendan a un demonio. Pero para su sorpresa, la vida que le depara el inframundo es mucho mejor que la que tenía con su familia.

Bajo la tutela de su nuevo dueño, un poderoso, pero solitario demonio que sólo quería cumplir su anhelo de tener un nieto, empieza a asistir a un instituto del que este es director después de firmar cierto contrato con él.

Ahora, Iruma tiene que intentar adaptarse al mundo de los demonios mientras esconde su naturaleza humana y se enfrenta a los distintos desafíos que lo esperan en su nuevo instituto. ¡Su nueva vida demoníaca acaba de empezar!
description.ru: Четырнадцатилетний Судзуки Ирума только что был брошен и продан демону его безответственными родителями! Тем не менее, к своему удивлению, он оказывается теперь живет с демоном, как его приёмный внук. Затем он поступил в школу, где его дед — Салливан, работает в качестве директора. Так начинается необычайная школьная жизнь Ирумы-куна среди потусторонних, встречая много красочных лиц, принимая на себя сложные задачи, и сталкиваясь со своим истинным — я, когда он поднимается, чтобы стать кем-то великим. Уютная волшебная повседневность с случайным городским терроризмом.
description.tr: On dört yaşındaki Iruma Suzuki hiçbir isteğe hayır diyemez. Sorumsuz ailesi, onları geçinmek için onu tehlikeli işlerden tehlikeli işlere koşturtur ve sonra bir gün onu bir iblise satarlar! Ancak iblis, Iruma'yı torunu olarak evlat edinmek isteyince çok şaşırır. Bu isteği reddedemeyen Iruma, büyük iblis Sullivan'ın torunu olur. Yeni sevecen iblis dedesi onu, Sullivan'ın tesadüfen müdürü olduğu İblis Okulu Babyls'e kaydettirir. Böylece Iruma-kun'un diğer dünyadakiler arasındaki sıra dışı okul hayatı başlar; birçok renkli iblisle tanışır, zorlu mücadelelere atılır ve büyük biri olmak için yükselirken gerçek benliğiyle yüzleşir.
description.vi: Mairimashita! Iruma-kun là câu chuyện kể về cậu bé Suzuki Iruma, người đã bị bố mẹ mình kí khế ước bán cho ác ma để đổi lấy tiền tài và bình an. Cậu bé Iruma đáng thương từ lúc mới biết đi (1 tuổi) đã phải "ra xã hội" lăn lộn, buôn ba khắp nơi với hai vị phụ huynh "tưng tửng" cho đến ngày một Ác Ma đến rước cậu đến Ma giới theo khế ước. Tưởng chừng như sắp vào bụng quỷ thì vị Ác Ma già nua này đã khóc lóc yêu cầu cậu làm cháu trai ông ta, với bản tính lương thiện và tốt bụng đến cả bản thân mình cũng phải kinh ngạc, cậu bất đắc dĩ đã đồng ý lời đề nghị đó và nhập học trường Ác Ma theo ý ông ta. Chuyện gì sẽ xảy ra tiếp theo, mời các bạn theo dõi cuộc sống học đường đầy bất thường của Iruma-kun.
description.pt-br:
Iruma Suzuki, de quatorze anos, não pode dizer não a nenhum pedido. Seus pais irresponsáveis ​​o fazem trabalhar em empregos perigosos para sustentá-los, e então um dia eles o vendem para um demônio! Mas, para sua surpresa, o demônio quer adotar Iruma como seu neto?  

Incapaz de recusar seu pedido, Iruma torna-se neto do grande demônio Sullivan. Seu novo avô demônio amoroso o matricula na Demon School Babyls - onde Sullivan é coincidentemente o diretor. Assim começa a extraordinária vida escolar de Iruma-kun entre o outro mundo, encontrando muitos demônios coloridos, enfrentando desafios assustadores e enfrentando seu verdadeiro eu enquanto ele se torna alguém grande.

[ 1° TEMP. DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 7, Cap 44. ]
[ 2° TEMP. DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 11, Cap 94. ]
[ 3° TEMP. DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 17, metade do Cap 147.]

description.en:
Jung Hyunwoo is just an unlucky gamer barely making ends meet in the VR game "God Wars." He even ends up losing access to his game account due to a horrible accident and is forced to create a new character. 

In the process, he discovers that he has an ability that allows him to see hidden information in the game, which leads him to become a Grand Warlock. 

Now equipped with a mind-blowing skill and a legendary class, all that's left is for him to level up and go from zero to hero...

---

- [Webtoon PV](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_7M4wH6g1eI)
description.ko:
'재능'도, '돈'도, '운'도 없던 정현우.

"게임의 히든 정보들이 왜 보이는 거지?"

감전 사고에 당하고부터 게임 속 보이지 않아야 하는 것들이 보이기 시작했다.

---

- [Webtoon PV](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_7M4wH6g1eI)

title.en: Keikenzumi na Kimi to, Keiken Zero na Ore ga, Otsukiai Suru Hanashi

altTitles.ja: 経験済みなキミと、 経験ゼロなオレが、 お付き合いする話

altTitles.ja-ro: Keiken Zumi na Kimi to, Keiken Zero na Ore ga, Otsukiai Suru Hanashi

altTitles.en: You Were Experienced, I Was Not: Our Dating Story

altTitles.ru: История знакомства опытной тебя и неопытного меня

altTitles.th: หนุ่มซิงกับสาวฮอต เดตนี้จะรอดมั้ยนะ

description.en:
Ryuuto Kashima is a gloomy high school student. Because of a punishment game, he was forced to confess to Runa Shirakawa, a girl from the top of school caste and admired by everyone. They ended up going out for the unexpected reason of "Err, I'm free now so..." but, Ryuuto ends up following and eavesdropping Runa getting confessed by a handsome soccer club member, and Runa bringing Ryuuto, whom she just started dating, to her own room as a matter of course. 

They have different friends and ways to have fun, different in just about everything. And yet, surprised by their differences everyday, accepting it, they begin to relate with each other.
___
**Character Designer:** [magako](https://mangadex.org/author/fd30d521-18ba-4638-94c3-700858ce7c43)
description.ja: スクールカースト最上位&憧れの美少女・月愛に罰ゲームきっかけで告白した、陰キャ気味の男子高校生・龍斗。返事はなんと、「今わたしフリーだし」という一言で即OK! こうして何もかも正反対の二人は、お付き合いすることになり…!?

altTitles.ja: 双星の陰陽師

description.en:
Rokuro Enmado is from a family of exorcists who remove evil Kegare, but his real dream is to be a singer, a soccer player, or anything other than an exorcist. When another exorcist, a girl named Benio Adashino arrives, Rokura is suddenly inflamed with competitive spirit and decides to put his natural knack to good use. Their rivalry gets more complicated when they both learn they are the destined "Twin Star Exorcists," two ultimate fighters fated to marry and create the prophesied child who will eliminate all the Kegare in the world.


---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media as **Twin Star Exorcists** (2019)
description.ru: С давних времён доблестные оммёдзи сражаются со скверной - злобными духами, рождёнными из человеческих страхов, боли и отчаяния. Рокуро с детства мечтал стать сильнейшим оммёдзи и очистить мир от скверны, но ужасная трагедия на долгие годы убила в нём всякое желание бороться. Но кому есть дело до желаний гиперактивного мальчишки, когда от него и талантливой девочки зависит судьба всего мира?
description.tr: Rokuro Enmado, kötü Kegare'yi ortadan kaldıran bir şeytan kovucu ailesindendir, ancak asıl hayali bir şarkıcı, futbolcu ya da şeytan kovucudan başka bir şey olmaktır. Benio Adashino adında başka bir şeytan çıkarıcı kız geldiğinde, Rokura aniden rekabetçi bir ruhla alevlenir ve doğal yeteneğini iyi bir şekilde kullanmaya karar verir. İkisi de kaderlerinde evlenip dünyadaki tüm Kegare'leri ortadan kaldıracak kehanet çocuğunu yaratmak olan iki nihai savaşçı, "İkiz Yıldız Şeytan Kovucu" olduklarını öğrendiklerinde rekabetleri daha da karmaşık bir hal alır.
description.pt-br: Rokuro sonha em se tornar tudo menos um exorcista! Então a misteriosa Benio aparece. Os dois são apelidados de "Exorcistas das Estrelas Gêmeas" e descobrem que estão destinados a se casar... Rokuro pode escapar de ambos os destinos? Quando o melhor amigo de Rokuro, Ryogo, desaparece, Rokuro é forçado a pedir ajuda a Benio para entrar em Magano, o reino dos Kegare, para resgatá-lo!

altTitles.ja: 王宮のトリニティ

description.en: In the Kingdom of Wardell Ceram, a realm rich in flowers and trees, the charming duo of Luca and Sylvain live outside the law. As the Wolf Claws, they are a chivalrous thieves who target those nobles who commit evil deeds. Their deeds bring them to the attention of the Kingdom's Princess, who wants to recruit them for a very special task. A romantic comedy about love that transcends class!

title.en: Bocchi the Rock! Gaiden:  Kikuri Hiroi's Heavy Drinking Diary

altTitles.ja: ぼっち・ざ・ろっく！外伝　廣井きくりの深酒日記

altTitles.en: Bocchi the Rock! Side Story: Hiroi Kikuri's Heavy Drinking Diary

altTitles.ru: Одинокий Рокер! Спин-офф: Дневник пьяницы Хирои Кикури

altTitles.vi: Bocchi the Rock! Ngoại Truyện: Nhật Ký Say Rượu của Hiroi Kikuri

altTitles.ja-ro: Bocchi the Rock! Gaiden: Hiroi Kikuri no Fukazake Nikki

description.en:
25 years old Kikuri Hiroi is a "genius bassist" who leads the indie band "SICK HACK" and loves alcohol. 
She often gets drunk and breaks the equipment inside concert clubs, so she's often short of money. 
She lives in a 52-year-old bathless apartment so she borrows showers from her friends sometimes. 
Regularly attacked by anxiety about her future, she counters that with a alcohol-fueled "happiness spiral". 
What is her daily life like...?!

title.en: The Seven Deadly Sins: Four Knights of the Apocalypse

altTitles.ja: 黙示録の四騎士

altTitles.tr: Yedi Ölümcül Günah: Mahşerin Dört Şövalyesi

description.en: Percival, a kind boy, lives with his grandfather in a remote place called "God's Finger". However, the world will not allow him to live in peace. An encounter with a mysterious knight changes their fate, and a shocking secret is revealed. The boy sets out on an endless journey. Whether you know "The Seven Deadly Sins" or not, you can still enjoy it! The world's most awaited adventure fantasy!
description.es:
La profecía se ha cumplido. "En un futuro no muy lejano, habrá cuatro caballeros sagrados que destruirán el mundo. Son los Cuatro Jinetes del Apocalipsis.""
Los santos caballeros que juraron fidelidad al rey Arturo estaban ansiosos por cortar el mal de raíz. Las consecuencias de estos acontecimientos llegan hasta la frontera... y sacuden el destino de un niño. Un niño que da el primer paso como le dice su corazón. ¿Qué le espera: sueños, esperanzas, gloria o pecado? La fantasía heroica del pasado y del presente, ¡el inicio!
description.fr: Percival vit seul avec son grand-père Bargis, au sommet d’une haute montagne nommée le “Doigt divin”. Il y mène une vie heureuse, préservé du monde extérieur. Mais le jour de ses 16 ans, son destin bascule : un mystérieux guerrier à l’armure rouge s’en prend violemment à lui et à son grand-père. En effet, ce Chevalier sacré de Camelot est chargé d’éliminer quiconque s’apparenterait aux “Four Knights of the Apocalypse”, un groupe de cavaliers qui, d’après la prophétie, apparaîtra pour renverser le roi Arthur… Laissé pour mort, Percival survit à ses blessures et décide de partir en quête de vengeance, et d’aventures !
description.ja:
『七つの大罪』正統続編！ 全世界待望の冒険ファンタジー!!

予言は示された。「遠くない未来、世界を滅ぼす四人の聖騎士が現れる。――その名を〈黙示録の四騎士〉」。厄災の芽を摘まんと色めき立つは、アーサー王に忠誠を誓いし一騎当千の聖騎士たち。その余波は、遠く辺境にまで及び……、一人の少年の運命を揺るがす！ 己が心の命ずるまま、一歩を踏み出す少年。その前途に待つは、夢か希望か栄光か罪か。古今無双のヒロイック・ファンタジー、開幕!!
description.pt: A profecia indicava que num futuro não muito distante, aparecerão quatro cavaleiros sagrados que destruirão o mundo: São os Quatro Cavaleiros do Apocalipse. Os quatro cavaleiros sagrados, que juraram fidelidade ao Rei Artur, estão muito animados para cortar esta calamidade pela raiz. As consequências chegam até à fronteira e abalam o destino de um rapaz, ......! Um rapaz dá um passo em frente como manda o seu coração. O que o espera é um sonho, uma esperança, glória ou pecado. Começa uma fantasia heróica dos mundos antigo e moderno!
description.tr: Nazik bir çocuk olan Percival, büyükbabasıyla birlikte "Tanrı'nın Parmağı" adlı uzak bir yerde yaşıyor. Ancak dünya onun barış içinde yaşamasına izin vermeyecektir. Gizemli bir şövalyeyle karşılaşmaları kaderlerini değiştirir ve şok edici bir sır ortaya çıkar. Çocuk sonsuz bir yolculuğa çıkar. "Yedi Ölümcül Günah"ı bilseniz de bilmeseniz de tadını çıkarabilirsiniz! Dünyanın en çok beklenen macera fantezisi!
description.uk: Історія є продовженням манги "Сім Смертних гріхів". Початок манги знайомить нас з Персівалем - шістнадцятирічний хлопець з ширяючого острова «Палець бога», який після певних подій вирушає в подорож чарівним королівством під назвою Британія.
description.es-la: Percival, un niño bondadoso, vive con su abuelo en un lugar remoto llamado "El dedo de Dios". Sin embargo, el mundo no le permite vivir en paz. Un encuentro con un misterioso caballero cambia su destino, y se revela un impactante secreto. El niño emprende un viaje interminable. Tanto si conoce "Los siete pecados capitales" como si no, ¡podrá disfrutar de él! ¡La fantasía de aventuras más esperada del mundo!
description.pt-br: Percival, um menino bem-humorado, vive com seu avô num lugar remoto chamado “O Dedo de Deus”. No entanto, o mundo não permite que ele viva em paz. Um encontro com um misterioso cavaleiro muda seu destino, e um segredo chocante é revelado. O menino embarca numa jornada sem fim.

altTitles.en: The Servant Is the Demon King?!

altTitles.vi: Đại Quản Gia Là Ma Hoàng

description.en:
Because he had the heritage of the ancient Demonic Emperor, Demonic Emperor Zhuo Yifan met the misfortune of being betrayed and killed by his trusted disciple. After being reborn, his cultivation went back to zero and he was trapped by a heart demon, given no choice but to become the housekeeper of the Luo Family's lone eldest miss. From being a Magic Emperor to being an insignificant housekeeper, how would he get along with his "heart demon eldest miss" and what power would he gain in order to lead himself and the declining family to rise back to the peak of the continent!


---

**Note:** 魔 can mean "magic" and "demon", while 管家 can mean "butler" and "housekeeper". I'm not sure as to why the previous translator decided to use "Magic" when it's a cultivation world, but I'll just follow. And Zhou Fan never does the work of a housekeeper throughout the manhua.

---

[Tapas](https://tapas.io/series/the-servant-is-the-demon-king/info)
description.vi: Ma Hoàng Trác Nhất Phàm vì nhặt được một truyền thừa của Thượng Cổ Ma Đế, mà dẫn đến họa sát thân. Sau khi được trọng sinh vào một cơ thể khác, cũng bởi vì tâm ma của chủ nhân cơ thể cũ, mà không còn cách nào khác, phải làm quản gia cho một gia tộc nhỏ bé. Cùng xem một đại ma hoàng đầy thủ đoạn tàn độc, sẽ làm thế nào để khiến cho một gia tộc nhỏ bé trở mình thành một gia tộc đứng trên tất cả.
description.pt-br: O protagonista é um imperador mágico e o homem mais forte vivo, ele é traido pelo seu subordinado e é morto, após isso ele reencarna em um menino sem cultivo e começa a trilhar seu caminho para a vingança.

altTitles.en: How to Live as a Fake Healer

altTitles.th: ฮีลเลอร์กำมะลอ

description.en:
One day, Seunghyeon Kang woke up to find himself in an unfamiliar world, on the continent of Azeul. At that moment, a status window pops up: 

[Your class is Healer?]

Wait, but he doesn’t have a single healing skill?! 

And so begins the life of a quack Healer who can’t cast Heal as he struggles to find a way back to his home!

altTitles.ja: The Legend of Dragon's Son
りゅうろうでん
龍狼伝

description.en:
Middle schoolers, Shiro and Masumi, encountered a mysterious dragon that brought them back to the time of the Three Kingdoms; situated in ancient China. As soon as they arrived, they were rescued by the Han Kingdom. Not long after these events, Masumi was kidnapped and Shiro barely escaped death… Soon the story gets more complicated as they are stuck in the past.  
  
In 1997, Ryuurouden won the Kodansha Manga Award for shōnen manga.
description.pt-br:
Estudantes do ensino médio, Shiro e Masumi, encontraram um dragão misterioso que os trouxe de volta ao tempo dos Três Reinos; situado na China antiga. Assim que chegaram, foram resgatados pelo Reino Han. Pouco tempo depois desses eventos, Masumi foi sequestrado e Shiro escapou por pouco da morte... Logo a história fica mais complicada, pois eles estão presos no passado. 

Em 1997, Ryuurouden ganhou o Prêmio Kodansha Manga para melhor mangá shounen.

title.en: Isekai de Haishin Katsudou wo Shitara Tairyou no Yandere Shinja wo Umidashite Shimatta Ken

altTitles.ja: 異世界で配信活動をしたら大量のヤンデレ信者を生み出してしまった件

altTitles.en: When I Started Streaming in Another World, I Ended Up Creating a Large Number of Yandere Followers

description.en: Living in Ataraxia, a world of swords and magic, a reincarnated individual decided to make a living out of streaming. Living in a world where such a thing did not exist despite the many forms of entertainment, he quickly made a name for himself. This is not the tale of just a streamer... but of a boy who becomes a legend as a haishinsha.
description.ja: 剣と魔法の世界アタラシア――その世界に生きる一人の転生者が配信活動に手を出した。 数多くの娯楽はあれど、そのようなモノが存在しなかった世界で彼はたちまち有名になった。 これは異世界で唯一の配信者……ではなく、ハイシンシャになろうと考えた少年の物語である。
description.vi: Anh nhân vật chính của chúng ta được chuyển sinh sang thế giới có sự tồn tại của ma thuật. Sở hữu trong mình sức mạnh bá ko tả nổi, anh sẽ đánh bại quái vật để kiếm sống ư? Không, anh chê, anh muốn theo đuổi đam mê, anh muốn làm streamer để kiếm sống.
description.pt-br: Vivendo em Ataraxia, um mundo de espadas e magia, um indivíduo reencarnado decidiu ganhar a vida com streaming. Vivendo em um mundo onde tal coisa não existia, apesar das muitas formas de entretenimento, ele rapidamente fez um nome para si mesmo. Esta não é a história de apenas um streamer... mas de um garoto que se torna uma lenda como um haishinsha.

description.en:
Long, long ago in Neraland, the pious human built a great tower to show the respect to their Goddess Nera.  
Goddess Nera was deeply moved by human piety; to reward them, she opened a door at the top of the tower. This ethereal door connected to another world; it was known as *Heaven's Eye*.  
However…
description.fr:
Il y a fort longtemps au royaume de Nera, les fidèles humains érigèrent une tour en signe de leur respect pour leur déesse Nera.  
La déesse Nera, profondément touchée par la foi de ces derniers, ouvrit une porte au sommet de la tour pour les récompenser. Cette porte mystique était connectée à un autre monde. Elle fut dénommée *l'Œil céleste*.  
Mais un jour…
description.uk:
Давним-давно в Нераланді благочестиві люди побудували велику вежу, в знак поваги до своєї богині Нери.   
Богиня Нера була глибоко зворушена людським благочестям; щоб нагородити їх, вона відчинила двері на верхівці вежі. Ці ефірні двері пов'язані з іншим світом; І були відомі як *Райське Око*.  
Однак…  


---
description.zh: 很久以前，诺拉大陆的人类为了表示对诺拉女神最崇高的敬意，筑起了一座宏伟的高塔。 女神为人们的虔诚所动， 在高塔的顶端打开了一扇通往异世的大门。 来自另一个世界的羽族人为人类带来了文明与进步，但最终两族人在各种矛盾下刀戈相向。 战后数百年过去了，大陆再一次笼罩在不安与诡异的阴云中...
description.pt-br:
Há muito, muito tempo atrás em Neraland, o piedoso humano construiu uma grande torre para mostrar o respeito à sua deusa Nera.

Deusa Nera ficou comovida pela piedade humana; para recompensá-los, ela abriu uma porta no topo da torre. Esta porta etérea conectada a outro mundo; era conhecida como "Olho do Paraíso". 

 Contudo...

altTitles.ja: ブクロキックス

description.en: The setting is Tokyo. Rumors are going around Tokyo of a prize of ten million for beating "Gyokutei Shinjuku" at blind soccer, and blind soccer experiences a sudden surge. Meanwhile, not far away in Ikebukuro, a South Korean girl named Ji-he recruits members for a blind soccer team. And one day, while working at a cabaret club, a blind young man named Oyamada comes in. Despite never playing blind soccer before, Oyamada is somewhat forcefully dragged into the team to fill out the numbers. However, this man actually is...
description.ja: 舞台は東京。ブラインドサッカーチーム「玉帝新宿」に勝てば賞金1千万という噂が東京を駆け巡り、にかわにブラインドサッカーが盛り上がりを見せる。その頃、少し離れた池袋で、ブラサカチームのメンバー探しをする韓国人の女の子・ジヘ。ある日、彼女が勤務するキャバクラに、盲目の青年・小山田がやってくる。ブラインドサッカー未経験ながら、数合わせのため半ば強引にチームに入れられる小山田。しかし、この男、実は……。

description.en: Gods have descended upon the world, and Da-il's ready to drag them all to hell. After the lives of his loved ones were taken by the gods, Da-il offers his soul in exchange for the powers of the very killer of gods, the Void.

title.en: Konjiki no Word Master -Yuusha Yonin ni Makikomareta Unique Cheat-

altTitles.ja: 金色の文字使い　―勇者四人に巻き込まれたユニークチート―

altTitles.ja-ro: Konjiki no Moji Tsukai: Yuusha Yonin ni Makikomareta Unique Cheat

altTitles.en: The Golden Word Master: The Four Heroes and the Innocent Bystander with the Unique Cheat

altTitles.ko: 금색의 문자술사: 워드 마스터 유니크 치트

altTitles.ru: Мастер золотых слов: Четыре героя и Наблюдатель с Уникальным читом

description.en:
In an RPG-like fantasy world consumed by warring nations and racial discrimination, the human kingdom summons five high school students from 21st-century Japan for assistance in their conflict with the demonkin. Now those students, with their experience of MMORPGs at their disposal, will hone their skills to protect the human kingdom of Edea.  
  
However, this isn't their story.  
  
Out of the five students, four of them were given the title of Hero and the fifth one the title of Innocent Bystander. He had been summoned by accident since he sat near the other four students. His name is Hiiro Okamura, an aloof bookworm with traveling and reading as his raison d'etre. Hiiro sees no reason to help the human kingdom in their offensive war with the demonkin, seeing that he isn't a Hero and that he has no real obligation to help them, and decides to leave the kingdom to go on his own adventure.  
  
Soon, Hiiro finds out that he has the very unique skill of Word Magic: magic that can materialize the definition of a word. As he travels more and more, he finds many uses for his Word Magic and many opportunities to find books, level up, and gain some of his own companions. Even with the outbreak of war on the horizon, Hiiro stays true to his desire to travel the new world he's in.
description.ja: 食事と読書を愛する“ぼっち”高校生の丘村日色が、クラスのリア充四人と異世界に飛ばされた！≪勇者≫の称号にリア充たちがはしゃぐなか、確認された日色の称号は≪巻き込まれた者≫…ってどういうことー!?
description.pt-br: Okamura Hiiro é introvertido e adora livros. Para ele, os livros são a sua razão de ser. Sua história começa com costume de invocar heróis de outro mundo. Cinco pessoas convocados, mas um deles é apenas um estranho arrastado acidentalmente, essa pessoa é Hiiro. Os outros quatro são seus colegas de classe, mas não é como se eles fossem amigos. Ao contrário dele, eles são riajuus (Pessoas normais na sociedade contrário de Otaku). Hiiro decidiu não para ajudar o país, a sua razão? "Eu não acredito em você. Eu não sou amigo deles. Não é da minha conta, e eu sou uma pessoa comum que se importa com a minha própria vida, então bye", e ele estabelece a sua própria jornada. Pouco sabem os outros heróis, que esta pessoa comum, Hiiro, na verdade esconde um poder que poderá mudar o mundo!

title.en: The Suspicious Boy Is One of the World's Top Ten Masters

description.en:
In the aftermath of Madorim's decline following the World War, a captivating tale unfolds as the maternal grandson, son of Lord Daesannim's daughter, returns to the city. Despite initial feelings of abandonment, he emerges as a figure of unexpected beauty in a martial arts world marked by rugged aesthetics.

Unveiling his true identity as the King of the Mu-myeon Mountain, a teenage expert who conquered the Dragon King of the Yellow River, the series promises a gripping narrative. Driven by his mother's last words and a determination to restore Madorim to its former glory, Jin Murip, this unparalleled teenage expert, arrives in Madorim.

altTitles.ko: 내 침대 밑에 괴물 남주가 산다

altTitles.ko-ro: Nae Chimdae Mit-e Goemul Namjuga Sanda

altTitles.en: The Regressed Son of a Duke Is an Assassin
The Regressed Youngest Son of the Duke Is an Assassin

altTitles.es: El asesino que retornó como el hijo del Duque
El pibe que retorna como el hijo menor

altTitles.es-la: La venganza del asesino de la espada demoniaca

altTitles.th: ลูกชายคนเล็กของดยุกคือมือสังหาร

altTitles.ja: 回帰した公爵家の末息子は暗殺者

description.en:
Cyan Vert, illegitimate son of the Duke and the empire's greatest assassin, is betrayed by the righteous brother whose shadow he's always lived in. But just before the fatal blow strikes his throat, Cyan awakes to find he's just a boy again. The young lord has been reborn, and this time, he's not going to live in anyone's shadow!

---
Cyan Vert, the best assassin of the continent, meets a pitiful death after having been betrayed by his own brother, whom he had trusted all his life.

"If I were given another chance at life, I would live it differently. I would only trust myself, and achieve all the things I want on my own without serving anyone else but myself."

That is how he was given a second chance at life. Cyan Vert, a shadow who lived for others, is no more. He will now pave a path on his own, for only him!

title.en: The Landmine-Type Senpai Who Gradually Develops a Liking for Younger People

altTitles.ja: だんだん年下好きになっていく地雷系先輩

altTitles.ja-ro: Dandan Toshishita Suki ni Natte Iku Jirai-kei Senpai

title.en: Ore no Ie ga Maryoku Spot datta Ken: Sundeiru dake de Sekai Saikyou

altTitles.fr: Ma maison est une zone de convergence magique: Uniquement en vivant là je suis le plus fort du monde

altTitles.ru: Мой дом — это место волшебной силы

altTitles.ja: 俺の家が魔力スポットだった件 ～住んでいるだけで世界最強～

altTitles.zh-hk: 原来我家是魔力点~只是住在那里就变成世界最强~

altTitles.ko: 우리 집이 마력스팟이었던 건에 대하여 ~살고 있는 것만으로 세계최강~

altTitles.pt-br: Minha casa está em um ponto mágico de poder, por morar lá eu me tornei o mais forte do mundo

altTitles.en: My House is a Magic Power Spot: Just by Living there I Become the Strongest in the World

altTitles.ja-ro: Ore no Ie ga Maryoku Spot datta Ken: Sundeiru dake de Sekai Saikyou

description.en: Living carefree at home is the greatest shortcut—my house is the world’s greatest Magic Power Spot. That being the case, both my house and I were summoned to another world by some guys who were aiming for it. However, I’ve been living in this place for many years and my body is, apparently, abnormally overflowing with magic. Due to some unforeseen circumstances by those guys who summoned me, they quickly ran away. Be that as it may, there are still some ill-mannered people who covet the magic leaking out of my house. I won’t give up my house to those people! I’m going to wield my power as I please!
description.ja: 自宅でのんびりすることが、最強への近道だった――。強力な魔力スポットの上に建つ一軒家に住んでいた普通の青年ダイチ。 ある日、それを狙うやつらに家ごと異世界に召喚されてしまう!!　だが、長年魔力スポットに住み続け、魔力が貯めこまれたダイチは敵を一蹴！　さらにかわいい我が家の精霊サクラも現れて至れり尽くせり！　最強の魔力を持ったダイチが望むものはただ一つ――それは自宅で平穏に暮らすこと！
description.ru:
Жить беззаботно в своём доме — это, несомненно, великолепно. Но мой дом — самое большое в мире место волшебной силы. Каким-то образом вышло так, что меня с моим домом перенесло в другой мир. Выяснилось, что меня призвали какие-то парни, которые хотели присвоить магию моего дома себе. Тем не менее, я живу в этом месте в течение многих лет, и мое тело, по-видимому, аномально переполнено магией. Из-за каких-то непредвиденных обстоятельств те ребята, которые меня вызвали, быстро убежали. Как бы то ни было, все ещё есть невоспитанные люди, которые жаждут магии, просачивающейся из моего дома. Я не отдам свой дом никому! Я буду использовать свою силу, как захочу!   

- [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n5915da/) (Raw)
description.es-la: Vivir sin preocupaciones en casa es el mejor atajo: mi casa es el mayor punto de poder mágico del mundo. Siendo ese el caso, tanto mi casa como yo fuimos invocados a otro mundo. Sin embargo, he estado viviendo en este lugar durante muchos años y aparentemente mi cuerpo está desbordado magia. Debido a circunstancias imprevistas por parte de los tipos que me invocaron, huyeron rápidamente. Como sea, todavía hay algunas personas mal educadas que codician la magia que escapa de mi casa. ¡No voy a ceder mi casa a esas personas! ¡Voy a ejercer mi poder como me plazca!
description.pt-br: Viver despreocupado em casa é a melhor coisa... minha casa é o maior ponto de força mágica do mundo. Sendo esse o caso, tanto minha casa quanto eu fomos convocados para outro mundo por algumas pessoas que estavam visado isso. No entanto, eu moro neste lugar há muitos anos e meu corpo está, aparentemente, transbordando de forma anormal com a magia. Devido a algumas circunstâncias imprevistas por aquelas pessoas que me chamaram, elas rapidamente fugiram. Seja como for, ainda há algumas pessoas mal-educadas que cobiçam a magia que vaza da minha casa. Eu não vou desistir da minha casa para essas pessoas! Vou usar meu poder como quiser!

altTitles.en: The Demonic Cult Leader Is Too Reluctant

description.en: The leader of the demonic cult is a formidable entity that everyone is afraid of. However, while the demonic cult members expect him to exude great violence, the new Demonic Cult Leader, Do Yu-gang, wishes to live a simple and peaceful life. Will his modest wish be granted in the end?

altTitles.ja: 悪役令嬢転生おじさん

altTitles.en: From Bureaucrat to Villainess: Dad's Been Reincarnated!

altTitles.ru: Перерождение Мужчины Средних Лет в Дочь Дворянина

altTitles.vi: Ông chú chuyển sinh thành nữ phụ phản diện

altTitles.es-la: El Viejo que Reencarno como la Villana

description.en: After a traffic accident, 52-year-old civil servant Kenzaburou Tondabayashi awakens to find he's become Grace Auvergne, a duke's daughter, and more importantly the villainess of an otome game. Not wanting to get in the way of the happy endings of the young characters around him, Grace sets out to play the role of the villain, but whether it's due to Kenzaburou's memories of being an affectionate parent getting in the way or not being able to remember those pesky foreign names properly, it ends up being a lot harder than it looks…
description.id:
Setelah mengalami sebuah kecelakaan, seorang PNS berusia 52 tahun bernama kenzaburou tondabayashi tiba-tiba berada di tubuh seorang putri duke yang bernama grace auvergne, terlebih lagi, grace merupakan seorang villainess di sebuah game otome. Tidak ingin mengganggu happy ending anak-anak muda yang ada di dekatnya, grace memutuskan untuk menjalankan perannya sebagai seorang villainess, tapi mungkin karena ingatan kenzaburou yang dulunya merupakan seorang orang tua yang penuh kasih sayang atau karena tidak bisa mengingat nama-nama asing, akhirnya setiap grace ingin menjalankan peran villainessnya, grace selalu terganggu.
Sehingga dia merasa menjadi seorang villainess ternyata lebih sulit dari yang dia pikirkan...
description.ja: 52歳の真面目な公務員・屯田林憲三郎は交通事故に遭う。気が付いたらそこは学園舞台の乙女ゲームのような世界…しかも校内一高飛車なオーヴェルヌ侯爵家の令嬢グレイスに転生してしまい!?
description.es-la: Tras perder el conocimiento, después de realizar un acto heroico, el oficinista de 52 años, Kenzaburou Tondabayashi, despertó como Grace Auvergne, la hija de un duque perteneciente a un juego Otome y a su vez la villana de la historia. En un afán de querer cumplir su rol como villana para no afectar la historia del mundo, verá cómo su carácter de padre amoroso y de persona amable harán que su objetivo sea más difícil de lo que esperaba...

altTitles.ja: 二度生きるランカー

altTitles.en: Ranker Who Lives A Second Time

altTitles.th: เกมชีวิตที่สอง ของแรงเกอร์

description.en:
Yeonwoo’s brother disappeared years ago, and he’s devastated to learn of his death.

As he copes with his loss, he’s given a pocket watch and learns there’s more to his brother’s death: he was betrayed while competing in the Tower of the Sun God.

Now it’s Yeonwoo’s turn to use the knowledge his brother left behind.

Can Yeonwoo navigate that world and gain enough power and experience to reach the top of the tower, defeating his brother’s enemies and all those who stand in his way?

---

- [Alternative Raw (Kakao Webtoon)](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%91%90-%EB%B2%88-%EC%82%AC%EB%8A%94-%EB%9E%AD%EC%BB%A4/2335)
description.fr:
Yeon-woo avait un frère jumeau qui a disparu il y a cinq ans. Un jour, une montre de poche laissée par son frère est retournée en sa possession. À l'intérieur, il a trouvé un journal intime caché dans lequel on pouvait lire : "Le temps que tu entendes ceci, je serai déjà mort…".  
l'Obélisque, la Tour du Dieu Soleil, un monde où plusieurs univers et dimensions se croisent. Dans ce monde, son frère avait été victime d'une trahison en montant la tour. Après avoir appris la vérité, Yeon-woo décida d'escalader la tour avec le journal de son frère.  
Yeon-woo passe ensuite par les mêmes épreuves que son frère cadet et combat en tant que joueur anonyme. Son but ? Vaincre la Tour de l'Obélisque et venger son frère.
description.id: Setelah 5 tahun hilang, Cha Yeonwoo menemukan fakta bahwa adiknya, Cha Jungwoo, sudah meninggal. Ketika membongkar barang peninggalan adiknya, dia menemukan sebuah jam saku. Jam saku itu adalah hadiahnya untuk Jungwoo supaya lulus ujian. Begitu membuka jam tersebut, Cha Yeonwoo mendengar suara adiknya yang menceritakan kehidupannya selama 5 tahun ini. Ternyata Cha Jungwoo bukan hilang melainkan terdampar di dunia lain. Di dunia itu pula Cha Jungwoo dikhianati dan dibunuh. Mendengar itu, amarah Cha Yeonwoo bangkit. Dia berniat balas dendam atas kematian adiknya. Berbekal pengetahuan yang dia dapat dari Jungwoo, Cha Yeonwoo pun pergi ke dunia lain tersebut. Berhasilkah Cha Yeonwoo balas dendam?!
description.it:
Yeon-woo aveva un fratello gemello scomparso cinque anni fa…  
Un giorno, un orologio da tasca lasciato da suo fratello è tornato in suo possesso. Dentro, ha trovato un diario nascosto nel quale è stato registrato “Quando ascolterai questo, immagino che sarò già morto …”
description.ja: ある日豪の元に届いた双子の弟・駿の訃報。 虚無感を感じる彼の元に駿の懐中時計が届く。 そして豪はその中に隠された駿の日記によって、 駿が道半ばで力尽きた太陽神の塔・オベリスクへと誘われていく―。 弟の復讐に燃える豪が挑む、痛快アクションファンタジー！
description.ko:
5년 전 사라진 쌍둥이 동생을 잊고 살던 연우.
어느날 그에게 동생의 유품인 회중시계가 돌아왔다.

그리고 그 속에 숨겨진 일기장.

'형이 이 일기를 들을 때 즈음이라면 나는 이미 이 세상 사람이 아니겠지.'

여러 차원과 우주가 교차하는 세계에 놓인 태양의 신 탑, 오벨리스크.
그리고 그곳에 오르다 배신당해 눈을 감아야 했던 동생.

모든 걸 알게 된 연우는 동생이 남겨 둔 일기와 함께 탑을 오르기 시작한다.

'오늘부터 난. 차정우이다.'
description.ru:
Ёну в течение 5 лет жил, смирившись с исчезновением своего младшего брата-близнеца. Однажды ему в руки попали карманные часы его брата.​ Внутри них он обнаружил спрятанную записку.​ «Брат, если ты сейчас слушаешь эти записи, то меня уже нет на Земле». Узнав о том, что его младший брат отправился в Обелиск — башню богов, которая находится где-то в космосе на пересечении нескольких измерений, и был предан, Ёну решает отправиться туда сам.
«С этого момента я буду Ча Чонъу.​»
description.th: ชายอนอู ชายหนุ่มที่น้องชายหายตัวไป พร้อมกับต้องเสียแม่ไปเพราะโรคร้ายได้ ได้ตัดสินใจไปเป็นทหารอาสาสมัครที่ประเทศแอฟริกา จนอยู่มาวันนึงเขาได้ค้นพบความจริงว่า น้องชายของเขาได้หายตัวไปขณะกำลังตามหา 'ยาอายุวัฒนะ' ของอีกโลกหนึ่ง เพื่อนำมารักษาแม่ พร้อมกับถ่ายโอนพลังทิ้งไว้แก่เขา
description.tr: Yeon-woo’nun kardeşi beş yıl önce ortadan kaybolmuştur. Bir gün kardeşinden kalan bir cep saati eline geçer. İçinde, kardeşinin bırakmış olduğu gizli bir günlüğün olduğunu fark eder. ”Sen bunu bulduğunda, ben çoktan bu dünyadan göçmüş olacağım.” Obelisk, güneş tanrısının kulesi, farklı evrenler ve boyutların iç içe geçtiği bir dünyadır. Kardeşi, bu dünyada kuleye tırmanmaya çalışırken ihanete uğrayıp hayatını kaybetmiştir. Gerçeği öğrenmiş olan Yeon-woo, kardeşinin günlüğü ile birlikte kuleye tırmanmaya karar verir. ”Şu andan itibaren ben, Cha Jeong-woo’yum.”
description.zh-hk:
延宇選擇遺忘5年前消失的雙胞胎弟弟，
過上屬於自己的生活，
卻在某天收到了弟弟的遺物——懷錶。

而在那懷錶之中，還隱藏著弟弟的日誌。

「當哥聽見我的日誌時，
也代表我已經不在這個世界上了吧。」

方尖碑——各個次元與宇宙交會的太陽神之塔。

弟弟就是在攻塔過程中遭受背叛，不幸喪命。

於是，得知一切真相的延宇帶著弟弟留下的日誌，
踏上了攻塔之路!

altTitles.es-la: La vida del regresor después del retiro

description.en:
After the first Gate opened in 2018, Lim Dae-In survived for 20 years on Earth while being connected to other dimensions. 

The day after his long-awaited retirement celebration, he regresses by 20 years, back to when he had nothing…

description.en:
The ninth story arc of Jojo’s Bizarre Adventure. 

O’ahu, present day. Dua Lipa is the trending musician, and COVID is still a major concern. On this island lives a 15-year-old boy named Jodio Joestar. Living with his brother and mother, he acts as a dealer for certain illegal substances. One day, his employer comes and shows him an excellent find: a Japanese person has landed in Hawaii with a diamond worth over six million dollars. Normally it would be impossible to steal, but for someone with a stand…

This is a story of a young boy and his quest to become rich.
description.hu:
Ez a Jojo's Bizarre Adventure kilencedik történetíve.

O'ahu, napjainkban. Dua Lipa a trendi előadó és a COVID még mindig a fő gond. Ezen a szigeten él egy 15 éves srác, Jodio Joestar. Bátyával és édesanyjával él, dílerként dolgozik és bizonyos illegális anyagokat árul. Egy nap, a főnöke mutat neki egy kiválló fogást: egy japán személy Hawaiira érkezett egy hat millió dollárt érő gyémánttal. Normális esetben lehetetlen lenne ellopni, de akinek standje van...

Ez egy fiatal fiú és az ő küldetésének a története, hogy gazdag legyen.
description.it: O'ahu, oggi. Dua Lipa è la musicista di tendenza e il COVID è ancora una delle principali preoccupazioni. Su quest'isola vive un ragazzo di 15 anni di nome Jodio Joestar. Vive con il fratello e la madre e fa lo spacciatore di alcune sostanze illegali. Un giorno, il suo datore di lavoro arriva e gli mostra un'eccellente scoperta: un giapponese è sbarcato alle Hawaii con un diamante del valore di oltre sei milioni di dollari. Normalmente sarebbe impossibile da rubare, ma per qualcuno con una posizione... Questa è la storia di un ragazzo e della sua ricerca della ricchezza.
description.uk:
Дев’ята сюжетна арка «Неймовірних пригод Джоджо». Оаху, теперішній час. Дуа Ліпа – популярна музикантка, а COVID-19 досі викликає серйозне занепокоєння. На цьому острові мешкає 15-річний хлопчик на ім'я Джодіо Джостар. Живе з братом і матір'ю, торгує певними забороненими речовинами. Одного разу його бос прийшов до нього і показав неймовірну знахідку: японець висадився на Гаваях з діамантом вартістю понад шість мільйонів доларів! Зазвичай, вкрасти таку коштовність було б неможливо, але для того, хто має стенд… 
Це історія про молодого хлопця та його прагнення розбагатіти.
description.es-la: Cierto japonés ingresó a la isla de Hawái con un diamante de valor de 6 millones de dólares. En la isla de Oahu vive un chico llamado Jodio Joestar, cuya meta es arrebatar el diamante de las manos de esa persona. Junto a sus asociados, irán a la quinta de esa persona. Sin embargo, ¿Qué misterios les esperan?

Reborn as the Heavenly Martial Demon

description.en:
Humanity lost the war. Businessmen who sold out their fellow compatriots, hunters who turned to the monsters, stepping on countless human corpses, all in order to earn profit. The otherworldly monsters that entered our world seized it bit by bit like a raging fire. That was until Zuo Chi arrived. 
"Back then you all were gladly invading our world, so why are you weeping now?"
description.fr:
L'humanité a perdu la guerre. Des hommes d'affaires ont trahi leurs compatriotes, et des chasseurs se sont transformés en monstres, piétinant d'innombrables cadavres humains, tout cela pour le profit. Les créatures d'un autre monde ont envahi le nôtre, le conquérant peu à peu comme un feu dévorant. Mais alors que tout semblait perdu, Zuo Chi est apparu.
"Autrefois, vous envahissiez notre monde avec jubilation. Pourquoi pleurez-vous maintenant ?"

altTitles.ja: マネマネ にちにち

description.en: In a certain school lies a certain club and its three managers. Though unremarkable, days that can't be found anywhere else have begun! Drawn by Yamamoto Souichiro is a brand new Sports ground youth story!
description.fr: Dans une certaine lycée se trouve un certain club et ses trois managers. Bien qu'anodins, des jours comme on n'en trouve nulle part ailleurs voient le jour ! Dessiné par Yamamoto Souichiro : une toute nouvelle histoire de jeunesse sur le thème du sport !
description.tl: Nakatakda sa beysbol klab ng isang hayskul, ito ay isang "kwentong pagdadalaga sa gilid," na nakatuon sa tatlong tagapamahala ng koponan na may napakaibang mga personalidad: si Nagisa, na halos hindi alam ang mga patakaran ng beysbol; si Ichinose, isang magarbo na gyaru; at si Himemiya, ang tahimik na babae na may nakakagulat na masamang pag-uugali.
description.vi: Slice of life của ba em quản lí CLB thể thao ở một trường cao trung nào đó... Để xem có gì hay!
description.pt-br: Numa determinada escola reside um determinado clube e as suas três ajudantes. Embora normais, dias que não podem ser encontrados em nenhum outro lugar começaram! Desenhado por Yamamoto Souichirou, é uma nova história juvenil de campo esportivo!

altTitles.ja: ナノ魔神

description.en:
After being held in disdain and having his life put in danger, an orphan from the Demonic Cult, Cheon Yeo-Woon, has an unexpected visit from his descendant from the future who inserts a nano machine into Cheon Yeo-Woon's body, which drastically changes Cheon Yeo-Woon's life after its activation. The story of Cheon Yeo-Woon's journey of bypassing the Demonic Cult and rising to become the best martial artist has just begun.

「未来の力を手に入れ、邪悪な魔教に立ち向かう！」 魔教の私生児として生まれた主人公・天黎雲。 幼い頃から卑しまれ、後継者争いで命を狙われる。 死に物狂いの抵抗もむなしく、危うく命を落としかねない絶体絶命のピンチに･･･！ その瞬間、突如現れた謎の男から「ナノマシン」と呼ばれる未来の力を注入され、 目覚めるととてつもない力を手に入れていた。 魔教を超え、最強の武人を目指す天黎雲の物語が幕を開ける！

description.ru:
Чен Еун — незаконнорожденный принц, появившийся на свет без единой частички Нейгуна. С самого раннего детства он находился под гнетом всеобщего отвращения. Весь забитый, с отсутствием какой-либо мотивации, год за годом Еун влачил свое жалкое существование. Ни на что не рассчитывая... и не претендуя.

Будучи изгоем, исконно презираемым шестью великими кланами, в один прекрасный день он оказался в окружении десятка подосланных убийц. Когда глаза практически застлала пелена белого света... и казалось, он уже начал теряться, проваливаясь в пучину... безграничного отчаяния, на горизонте возникла еле заметная фигура.

Неизвестный "потомок", снизошедший из будущего, в мгновение ока уничтожил всех врагов. Прошептав нечто невнятное, он подсадил в тело нашего героя какой-то странный предмет... наномашину. С этого момента все кардинально переменилось. Поселившийся где-то внутри искусственный интеллект дал его жизни невероятный толчок.

Больше не будет как прежде. Это... новая ветвь истории. Истории о парне, который бросил вызов небесам.

description.en:
In a dilapidated castle, Astaroth awoke as a Demon King. With his ‘wisdom from his past life,’ he would rule over his lands as a thorough ‘realist.’ “Demon King, why are you attacking the level 1 Heroes?” “Defeat them before they become stronger. That is called strategy.”  “Demon King, why are you sending fake money to the enemy country?” “To bring chaos to their economy, so they will self-destruct.” “The werewolf troops have attacked. Should we use silver bullets?” “Not bullets, shoot them with cannons.”  
  
And like that, Astaroth ‘reformed’ the old tendencies. He became a lord who was loved by the people and his subordinates, and he would go on to be called the most powerful Demon King in history.
description.ja: 72の魔王が跋扈する混沌とした世界に、72番目の魔王として転生したアシュタロト。そんな彼の前に突如謎の女神が現れ、この世界を改革するようアシュタロトを導く。初めに召喚したメイド兼参謀の魔族・イヴを従え、現実主義者（リアリスト）魔王の伝説がはじまる！
description.pt-br: Em um castelo em ruínas, Astaroth acordou como um Rei Demônio. Com sua "sabedoria de sua vida passada", ele governaria suas terras como um completo "realista".Conheça quem se tornou um senhor que era amado pelo povo e seus subordinados, o homem que seria chamado de o mais poderoso rei demônio da história.

title.en: Nou Aru Ogre ga Tsuno o Kakusu

altTitles.ja: 能あるオーガは角を隠す

altTitles.ja-ro: Nou Aru Ogre ga Tsuno wo Kakusu

altTitles.en: A Talented Ogre Hides Its Horn

description.en:
A hero who dies in a fight with the Demon King is cursed on the verge of death. The curse was to reincarnate the hero as Rama, the daughter of a half-ogre and a half-human. 

Sixteen years have passed since then. Rama, who was reincarnated in an ogre village, was tormented by discrimination and prejudice because of her origin, but she had grown beyond the confines of the ogre village, making use of her experience as a former hero. The village chief, who has taken notice of her, gives her an order. The order was to select Rama as the new "Demon King Candidate" from the Ogre village.
description.ja:
魔王と相討つ形で死んだ勇者の男は、死の淵で魔王にある”呪い”をかけられる。その”呪い”とは勇者をオーガと人間の混血。ハーフオーガの娘「ラーマ」として輪廻転生させるものだった。
―その後16年の月日が経った。オーガの村に転生したラーマは、その出自故の差別や偏見に苛まれながらも、元勇者としての経験を生かしてオーガの村に収まらないほど成長していた。そんな彼に目を付けた村長よりある命令が下される。その命令とは、ラーマを新たな「魔王候補」としてオーガの村から選抜する、というものであった……。
”人”と”オーガ”との間で揺れ動く元勇者を描く、本格異世界ファンタジー。開幕！

description.en:
"Is this how it feels to have a friend?" 

Bibi is obsessed with Peter, the prince of the school. When she spots Amy next to him, she starts to feel jealous. She invites Amy to her house to warn her, but instead takes a liking to the girl. They agree to be friends on the condition that Amy has to help Bibi confess.
description.fr:
"C'est ce qu'on ressent lorsqu'on a une amie ?"
Bibi est obsédée par Peter, le prince de l'école. Lorsqu'elle repère Amy près de lui, elle commence à être jalouse. Elle invite Amy chez elle pour la prévenir, mais à la place, elle commence à apprécier cette fille. Elles acceptent d'être amies à la condition que Amy doive aider Bibi à se déclarer.
description.ko:
"원래 친구 사이엔 이런 기분이 드는 걸까?"

'비비'는 학교 제일의 킹카 피터에게 집착하다, 그의 곁에 있던 '에이미'를 보고 질투를 느낀다. 그녀에게 경고하기 위해서 자신의 집에 초대했지만 오히려 호감을 느끼게 되고...
둘은 비비의 고백을 돕는다는 조건으로 서로에게 유일한 친구가 되기로 한다.
description.ru:
"Вот что значит быть друзьями?" Биби одержима Питэром, принцем школы.
Когда она замечает Эми рядом с ним, она начинает ревновать. Она приглашает Эми к себе, чтобы предупредить. Но вместо этого Эми нравится ей. Они соглашаются быть друзьями, но при одном условии: Эми должна помочь Биби признаться в любви.

altTitles.ja: 黒の召喚士
The Berserker Rises to Greatness.

description.en:
"If you truly want to get stronger, you have to challenge and defeat those stronger than yourself."

While being transmigrated to another world, Kelvin bartered away his memories for a collection of powerful new abilities. Setting out on the ultimate adventure as the world’s strongest Summoner — with his first Follower being the very goddess who brought him over! — he soon discovers his true nature as a battle junkie. Someone wants to pick a fight? Sure, bring it on!

Facing off against one formidable foe after another, Kelvin can hardly contain his delight as he revels in the absolute exhilaration of a good fight! The curtain rises on the start of an epic saga as this black-clad warrior and his allies carve their way into the annals of history! 
___
**Character Designer:** [Kurogin (DIGS)](https://mangadex.org/author/ad469135-32c7-4fcc-b490-d0ebc07eea16)

**Additional Links:**  
- [Official Raw Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n1222ci/)
- [Official English Light Novel](https://j-novel.club/series/black-summoner)
description.ru: Он очнулся в мире ничего не помня о себе, даже имени. Зато это мир меча и магии, а он призыватель. Ну, вперед, осваиваться в новом мире!
description.pt-br: As cortinas dessa história se abrem quando nosso protagonista troca suas memórias por um poder imensurável em um novo mundo. Agora, com o nome de Kelvin, ele precisa evoluir, dominar novos subordinados e se tornar o maior invocador de todos os tempos. Mas e então, até onde essa jornada vai nos levar?

altTitles.ja: 冷たくて 柔らか

description.en: Takara Itosaki's boyfriend of two years, whom she had been thinking of marrying, suddenly dumps her. He states, "I'm not sure if you like me anymore because you don't get jealous." She has liked and cherished her past boyfriends in her own treasured way, but for some reason she is not always depressed when they break up. One day, a beautiful woman visited the real estate agency where she works. After talking with her for a while, she realizes that she is Ema, a classmate of hers, who transferred to another school in the second year of junior high school...

title.ja: Onimotsu to Yobareta Tensei Hime wa, Shoukan Yuusha ni Koi wo Shite Seijo ni Narimashita

altTitles.ja: お荷物と呼ばれた転生姫は、召喚勇者に恋をして聖女になりました

altTitles.en: Reborn as the Princess Known as a Burden, I Fell in Love With the Hero and Became the Saint
Reborn as the Princess Known as a Burden, I Fell in Love With the Hero and Became the Saintess

description.en:
A sickly girl is reincarnated in another world as a princess. However, she is looked down on as she does not possess any type of magic. Her purification ability awakens just in time a hero is summoned from another world. Feeling needed for the first time, she starts to fall in love with him... but, for some reason his attitude seems cold?

---
[Original Web Novel](https://www.pixiv.net/novel/series/1234739)
description.ja:
聖女と勇者のキスが、世界を救う鍵！？

魔法が絶対の王国で、魔力のない姫に転生してしまい、日陰で暮らしていたレイア。
しかし、伝説の聖女と同じ浄化の力があると分かり、最強の召喚勇者・カズヤの助けになるように請われて帝国に向かう事に。誰かの役に立てる事を喜ぶレイアだったけど、勇者はどこかレイアによそよそしくて…？
不遇の聖女×最強勇者の世界を救う恋の話。
